attributes.action: Request the Resignation of the Arch Bishop of the Church of England Dr Rowan Williams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent topical events have shown the Arch Bishop to be 'not fit for purpose'. He should concentrate his energies on the spiritual well being of his flock and not on inciting racial tensions and encouraging the existence of states within a state and a two tier legal system, when the law of the land should always apply equally to all citizens, irrespective of cultural heritage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
